string-array.name: tips_array
string-array.item: Keep lettuce in the crisper drawer of your refrigerator to maintain its crispness and freshness.
Wrap lettuce in paper towels before storing it in a resealable plastic bag to absorb excess moisture and prevent wilting.
Ensure that the lettuce leaves are dry before storing them, as excess moisture can cause them to spoil faster.
Wash and trim lettuce just before using it rather than in advance to prevent moisture buildup, which can lead to spoilage.
Keep lettuce away from ethylene-producing fruits like apples and bananas, as exposure to ethylene can cause lettuce to ripen and spoil more quickly.
